summary: Allows Sorine Jurard to sell the Necromantic Healing and Heal Undead spells.
descriptionHtml:
--Description--
I disliked the fact that joining the Dawnguard prevented you from buying these two spells, so I made a mod to change that. This simply allows Sorine Jurard (who already sells the Sun Fire spell) to sell Necromantic Healing and Heal Undead. Requires Dawnguard. Enjoy!

--Conflicts--
Any mod that changes what Sorine sells may conflict with this mod.

--Changelog--
1.0: Release.
author: Marioface5
